Welcome to CERN Open Days registration system
The CERN Open Days is a free event, but registration is required to guarantee your access to the sites.

available places table header tickets available text

trans-unit.source: More information on why and how to register is available
trans-unit.note: more information about the event description text

trans-unit.source: The passcode you will use must have been issued less than 30 minutes ago. Otherwise request a new passcode.
The passcode will be sent by email and be valid for 30 minutes. It will allow you to login for registration.
Request a new passcode by email
Enter your email address and we will send you the passcode.
Soon you will receive an email with your access to the registration page. If you havenâ€™t received it in your inbox, please check your spam folders..
I understand that,my personal data will be processed by CERN in accordance with the terms of the
Open Days 2019 Visitors Registration Privacy Notice
trans-unit.note: personal data agreement part 2 link of privacy notice
personal data agreement part 3 link between text
personal data agreement part 3 link site security

trans-unit.source: I acknowledge that,as a consequence of visiting CERN, my image may be captured in photographs and recordings made by professional photographers engaged by CERN as well as visitors to Open Days. To the extent that I do not wish to be in such photographs and recordings I recognise that it is my responsibility to take measures to ensure that my image is not captured. I further understand and accept that CERN bears no responsibility for the photographs and recordings taken by visitors on the CERN site.
Shortly after you finish your reservation, you will receive a confirmation email with a QR code.

trans-unit.note: dialog no fast track lhc tickets

trans-unit.source: There are no Fast Track LHC tickets for this slot do you want to proceed ?
trans-unit.note: dialog no fast track lhc tickets text

trans-unit.source: This site offers one LHC visit point

trans-unit.note: transport type selector instructuin header text

trans-unit.source: To help us organizing the event, please let us know what transportation mean you plan to use to reach your arrival point.
To help us organizing the event, please let us know where you will come from.
Specify the number of visitors (max of 6, including yourself and children) and their age.
If it is still available you can pick the LHC Fast Track option (12 years old or over) that guarantees a faster access. LHC visits are possible without this option.
There must be an adult (18 years old or over) in all groups of visitors.
Number of available LHC Fast Track:
Group has person with reduced mobility

Here you choose the site and time of your arrival. It is on that site and at that time that you will get bracelets to get access to all sites and activities until the closing time that day.Please note that this registration does not guarantee a visit to the LHC as capacity for these visits is limited. However, it does guarantee access to many other exciting visits and activities on the surface.
Select site and time of arrival
